title: A monitor function block that sends an event whenever a certain value of an attribute for a particular node has changed.
description: Input data model for onattributechange query function block.

monitorId.description: UUID to endentify events (replies) that belong gto this query

monitorOperation.description: REGISTER or UNREGISTER a listener to this monitor

id.description: Id of the node to be monitored.

attributeKey.description: Attribute(s) indentified by its key to be monitored.
